titles.title: Regional Impact of Disasters and Emergencies Relief Act

To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to expand eligibility for individual and public assistance to certain areas and to include cumulative damage from multiple natural catastrophes in the definition of major disaster, and for other purposes.
Regional Impact of Disasters and Emergencies Relief Act
RIDER Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary:
Regional Impact of Disasters and Emergencies Relief Act or the RIDER Act
This bill expands eligibility for individual and public assistance to areas contiguous to an area designated as eligible to receive assistance as a result of a major disaster and includes cumulative damage from multiple natural catastrophes within the definition of major disaster.
